Trigger.name: Dice rolls
Trigger.script:
dice_rolls = dice_rolls or {}
local d1 = tonumber(matches[2]) local d2 = tonumber(matches[3]) local who = f"{matches[4]} roll " local index = 1
while table.contains(dice_rolls, who..index) do index = index + 1 end
table.insert(dice_rolls, {name=who..index, value=d1+d2})

regexCodeList.string: A bartender rolls a (\d+) and a (\d+) for (.+)!$
